title: Washington (England)
name: Penshaw Monument
address: Chester Road, Penshaw, County Durham, DH4 7NJ
directions: Penshaw Monument is located just outside of the Washington area, in the village of Penshaw in Houghton-Le-Spring, which is part of the City of Sunderland
content: The Penshaw Monument was built in 1844 and is dedicated to John George Lambton, first Earl of Durham and the first Governor of Canada.
